ShortSummary: Factory that produces Dropwizard (Codahale) metrics trackers for HikariCP using a provided MetricRegistry.
Summary: CodahaleMetricsTrackerFactory implements MetricsTrackerFactory and encapsulates a Dropwizard MetricRegistry. It creates CodaHaleMetricsTracker instances for specific HikariCP pools (identified by poolName) and their PoolStats, enabling integration of HikariCP metrics with Dropwizard.
MostImportantThings: Implements MetricsTrackerFactory for HikariCP metrics integration.
Holds a MetricRegistry injected via constructor; accessible through getRegistry().
create(poolName, poolStats) returns a CodaHaleMetricsTracker bound to the same MetricRegistry.
Enables wiring HikariCP pool metrics into Dropwizard/Codahale metrics.
RelatedFunctionality: HikariCP metrics configuration that accepts a MetricsTrackerFactory
